Literature.Title: Peptoid-Substituted Hybrid Antimicrobial Peptide Derived from Papiliocin and Magainin 2 with Enhanced Bacterial Selectivity and Anti-inflammatory Activity.
Literature.Author: Shin A, Lee E, Jeon D, Park YG, Bang JK, Park YS, Shin SY, Kim Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:-=NA,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:50% Cell death=39 µM
